answer:
QUESTION
I got a job at one place in the US. To get the licence for this job, it is required by the authorities that I should have the related experience in that field in my home coutnry.. I don't have that experience. Can i get this experience in USA as I don't want to go back to my country (because of political conditions) and show the authorities on paper that I had this required experience in my country.
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to receive in this manner.

Keep on trying other avenues and, Insha Allah, Allah Ta'ala will open up
another Halaal avenue for you.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
